lyric:
[00:00.133]I love it when you call me señorita
[00:04.725]I wish I could pretend I didn't need ya
[00:09.191]But every touch is ooh-la-la-la
[00:12.467]It's true, la-la-la
[00:14.704]Ooh, I should be runnin'
[00:16.973]Ooh, you keep me coming for ya
[00:21.593]
[00:21.819]Land in Miami
[00:24.259]The air was hot from summer rain
[00:26.684]Sweat drippin' off me
[00:28.825]Before I even knew your name, la-la-la
[00:34.120]It felt like ooh-la-la-la
[00:39.942]Sapphire moonlight
[00:42.411]We danced for hours in the sand
[00:44.671]Tequila Sunrise
[00:46.755]Your body fit right in my hands, la-la-la
[00:51.939]It felt like ooh-la-la-la, yeah
[00:56.154]
[00:56.331]I love it when you call me señorita
[01:00.731]I wish I could pretend I didn't need ya
[01:05.159]But every touch is ooh-la-la-la
[01:08.730]It's true, la-la-la
[01:10.993]Ooh, I should be runnin'
[01:13.095]Ooh, you keep me coming for ya
[01:15.954]
[01:16.102]Locked in the hotel
[01:18.009]There's just some things that never change
[01:20.665]You say we're just friends
[01:22.661]But friends don't know the way you taste, la-la-la
[01:27.827]Ooh I know it's been a long time coming
[01:30.534]Don't ya let me fall, oh
[01:33.594]Ooh, when your lips undress me, hooked on your tongue
[01:37.870]Ooh, love, your kiss is deadly, don't stop
[01:41.047]
[01:41.083]I love it when you call me señorita
[01:45.681]I wish I could pretend I didn't need ya
[01:49.995]But every touch is ooh-la-la-la
[01:53.510]It's true, la-la-la
[01:55.725]Ooh, I should be runnin'
[01:58.898]I love it when you call me señorita
[02:03.564]I wish it wasn't so damn hard to leave ya
[02:08.000]But every touch is ooh-la-la-la
[02:11.402]It's true, la-la-la
[02:13.769]Ooh, I should be runnin'
[02:15.880]Ooh, you keep me coming for ya
[02:19.425]
[02:19.859]All along, I've been coming for ya
[02:24.588]And I hope it meant something to you
[02:28.799]Call my name, I'll be coming for ya
[02:32.871]Coming for ya
[02:35.174]Coming for you
[02:39.901]Ooh-la-la-la-la-la-la-la
[02:49.610]Ooh, I should be runnin'
[02:51.918]Ooh, you keep me coming for ya
tlyric:
[by:Hromyqibed]
[00:00.133]喜欢你叫我“小姐”的模样
[00:04.725]难抑喜悦 心花怒放
[00:09.191]一举一动 惊心动魄
[00:12.467]真情流露
[00:14.704]本该一走了之
[00:16.973]却被你勾心引怀
[00:21.819]踏足迈阿密
[00:24.259]雨袭夏日 空暖气热
[00:26.684]汗水浸透全身
[00:28.825]甚至都未知名知姓
[00:34.120]却早就一见钟情
[00:39.942]幽蓝月光独照
[00:42.411]在沙滩上你我不停作舞
[00:44.671]酌酒直到日升之际
[00:46.755]相抱在怀 甚是绝配
[00:51.939]这感觉无可言表
[00:56.331]喜欢你叫我“小姐”的模样
[01:00.731]难抑喜悦 心花怒放
[01:05.159]一举一动 惊心动魄
[01:08.730]真情流露
[01:10.993]本该一走了之
[01:13.095]却被你勾心引怀
[01:16.102]在旅馆闭门上锁
[01:18.009]有些事如旧不变 至久不更
[01:20.665]口称你我只是朋友
[01:22.661]但朋友哪曾见过你放荡的样子
[01:27.827]或许就是压抑过久了吧
[01:30.534]一定要将我接住
[01:33.594]迷人之唇令我纵情解衣 轻巧烈舌让我欲罢不能
[01:37.870]你的亲吻使我窒息 因此情欲更长
[01:41.083]喜欢你叫我“小姐”的模样
[01:45.681]难抑喜悦 心花怒放
[01:49.995]一举一动 惊心动魄
[01:53.510]真情流露
[01:55.725]本该一走了之
[01:58.898]喜欢你叫我“小姐”的模样
[02:03.564]多希望没那么依赖你
[02:08.000]一举一动 惊心动魄
[02:11.402]真情流露
[02:13.769]本该一走了之
[02:15.880]却被你勾心引怀
[02:19.859]此久已来 我都对你日思夜想
[02:24.588]只愿你不会薄情寡意
[02:28.799]我会随叫随到 从不犹豫
[02:32.871]不止思念
[02:35.174]日思夜想
[02:39.901]
[02:49.610]本该一走了之
[02:51.918]却被你勾心引怀
